file_content.text: Moff Masken, I presume. Darth Baras sent me. I've liberated your ship. Where is Admiral Monk?
Well, well... come to inspect the scene of the crime, eh? Admiral Monk and his top men jettisoned down to Quesh.
I'm so sorry you missed him. Are you here to deliver his reward? Offer congratulations?
What are you talking about?
Explain yourself.
Is that your best attempt at gratitude?
Show some respect.
You think I should be grateful?
My orders are to kill Admiral Monk.
Quite the opposite.
You and your master must think I'm monumentally stupid.
This was a secret attack, yet I come out of hyperdrive to find the Republic's most decorated admiral laying in wait.
Admiral Monk had my force field and docking codes--this stinks of a setup.
Exactly what are you suggesting, Masken?
Are you implying something?
You know full well what I'm driving at.
I suggest you clean house and find the rat.
You must have a leak.
This was no Imperial leak.
The admiral is someone to be reckoned with.
Maybe Monk is that good.
Can it be that Baras doesn't include you in his deceits?
Your master's master is Darth Vengean. Baras manipulated him into this attack in order to ruin him.
I've had a bellyful of Sith in-fighting always undermining Imperial operations. It's why we have yet to crush the Republic outright.
I don't have time for this. I have to hunt down Admiral Monk.
Like to help, but I must go.
Don't you turn your back on me. You're going to answer for this!
Accept it--you are merely the toys we play with.
We do whatever we want.
I'm not taking it anymore. You will pay for your master's manipulations.
Men, kill the Sith! Darth Vengean will reward us!
Let me end your suffering, Masken.
I'm tired of you. [Attack]
To arms, men, the Sith attacks!
